content:
As an AI language model, I cannot predict the future or make subjective evaluations about music. However, there are certainly newer albums that have received critical acclaim and have the potential to become classics in the future. Here are a few examples of recent albums that have received widespread critical praise:

1. 25 by Adele (2015)
2. Lemonade by Beyoncé (2016)
3. Blonde by Frank Ocean (2016)
4. DAMN by Kendrick Lamar (2017)
5. A Seat at the Table by Solange (2016)
6. 1989 by Taylor Swift (2014)
7. My Beautiful Dark Twisted Fantasy by Kanye West (2010)
8. Good Kid, M.A.A.D City by Kendrick Lamar (2012)
9. Melodrama by Lorde (2017)
10. Black Messiah by D'Angelo and The Vanguard (2014)

It's worth noting that the status of these albums as future classics is subjective and can only be determined by the cultural impact they have over time. Nonetheless, these records have captured the attention and praise of music critics, and they have resonated with listeners in a big way.
